website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix P600 isn't the quickest camera, but that might be a small price to pay for having such a long lens on a relatively compact, lightweight camera.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix P600 packs a powerful lens, a nice vari-angle LCD, and a respectable set of shooting options and controls that should satisfy auto and manual users alike
Considering its zoom range, the camera is remarkably compact and light
cons: While the P600's shooting performance is decent, at times it can feel slow in use
It can be slow to autofocus as well, particularly when fully zoomed in
Also, the lens makes a lot of noise while moving it when recording movies
Enthusiasts might be disappointed by the lack of a hot shoe and raw support

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today..I opened it put battery and sd card in then went outside and took a few pictures...Oh my goodness, the photo quality is amazing for a point and shoot! I have only taken pictures on auto so far but if it's that good on auto, I am looking forward to playing around with it...I posted my first 3 photo's for those that are interested...I am recovering from a broken wrist and my hands are not steady, if I can get good photos anyone will be able to.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Broke right after warranty period !
customer_reviews.text: If this camera would have broken during the 1 yr warranty, I'd be positive about it. But, as soon as the warranty expired, it broke. First, it stopped charging the battery. With a dead camera, it's impossible to download the firmware fix. Found someone with the same camera and borrowed their battery. Download was successful. But that lasted about 1 month. Won't turn on. Before this latest breakdown, the display would show "Auotfocus" and then "Scene" back and forth and I missed most of my shots waiting for it to settle down. Focus was slow and poor. Now they want at least $137.50 plus shipping for repair, if they can fix it. I'm done with Nikon products.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this camera! I only had it ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this camera! I only had it for 2 years and it completely stopped working for no reason. I took it to the camera store and they said it is of no use. I could send it off, but the minimum charge is $250. I called Nikon and they will not do anything for me!! I will not ever by another Nikon camera again!! Buyer Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Webster

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. It is a decent size and takes beautiful pictures. The only reason for the four stars is that one of the major reasons I chose this camera was the wifi capabilities. You're supposed to be able to send photos from the camera to your iphone (the app is not available on ipad) by connecting the two. However, this worked only once, the app constantly crashes, even if you're just trying to send one photo. Since this was a major selling point for me personally, I'm pretty disappointed that it doesn't work AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: J Bomb

customer_reviews.title: Short aperture range a let-down.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The camera has a great zoom range, but its shortcomings make me unhappy about my purchase. I am most disappointed in the aperture range, or lack thereof. Controls include both shutter priority and aperture priority, but the slow aperture range only runs about 2 f-stops, making both a joke. It has other shortcomings, but the limited aperture range alone makes me wish I had not bought the Nikon P600.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX P600
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera if the main thing you are looking for is zoom, just don't expect to blow your photos up large and have them look good. I would say no bigger that 8.5 x 11 for print size. The two biggest flaws I see with this camera are it's inability to handle low light and shots with a lot of movement. all in all though for the price I would say it's a very good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas -LS-

customer_reviews.title: Great travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Do I loove this camera!! True, it's not as good as my DSLR but as a travel camera it's unbeatable. The eye-level viewer makes it shoot like a DSLR and the articulated LCD screen enabled me to take shots that I couldn't do with the EVF. The picture quality is very good and image stabilization works very well,l even at long focal lengths. I imagine the B700 is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: The 60x zoom is nothing short of amazing. Picture quality in all lighting conditions is excellent. This is probably the best camera that I have ever had. One thing to note is to be sure and fully charge the battery before your first use. The battery indicator on the screen may tell you it is fully charged but it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera but works sluggishly
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid camera, and that images are fine. But my overall complaint is about the menu system and handling. Everytging is slow and not smooth. For example, after reviewing an image and wanting to zoom in, the screen goes blank for 1/2 second or so. That sounds like a small matter, but delays happen with lots of common actions. I returned it and spent $100 more to get a Canon SX60, which is not perfect either, but operates very well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Branderhorst

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got the P600 for my wife for her birthday. She loves it for taking wildlife photos. She still carries her smaller Canon for erveryday photos because of size and weight. I was concerned about image stabilization with the high zoom, but it actually does very well. Much better than my wife's previous Nikon high zoom camera.
customer_reviews.author: Guy W. Bohner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing photos and features
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing photos, even zoomed way in. Fits great in your hand with the rubber grip, wi-fi function makes it so easy to transfer photos but it takes a couple tries to figure it out. You'll be amazed how far in you can zoom and still get clear photos, I know I was.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, slow focus.
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is great. Pictures are very crisp even at full zoom. The focus is extremely slow, unless you are in bright light. The write speed is a little slow also. Bird mode is useless, Moon mode is very good. If you can put up with the slow focus, buy this camera for the image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bezoar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this camera! I bought it for the zoom capabilities for birding and the more I use it, I find it has so much more to offer. It is light weight and comfortable to grip. I prefer the viewfinder to the screen, but use the screen to review and crop photos. I'm really glad I bought this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: This camera has great capabilities.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am impressed. I had been using the Nikon COOLPIX P520 and was very pleased with it, but this camera surpasses it's performance by miles in my opinion. It is light and easy to use and takes superb pictures. I have a Nikon DSLR that doesn't go with me often because this camera has such great zoom and wide angle capabilities that I don't need to lug around the heavy camera.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Nonetheless the zoom capabilities make up for that ans you get nice sharp shots in the right conditions from distances impossibl
customer_reviews.text: Only caveats - no hotshoe and the focus and performance in low light has been an issue. Nonetheless the zoom capabilities make up for that ans you get nice sharp shots in the right conditions from distances impossible with most cameras. Best option i could find for travel with a small lens.
customer_reviews.author: @ForresterEnt

customer_reviews.title: Description isn’t actual product received
customer_reviews.text: Stated free of visual scratches, lens casing covered in deep scratches, end of lens scratches, lcd screen scratches and pixel damage. Product is not what is being offered.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn P

customer_reviews.title: I only need this for long range zoom and this is the main reason I bought it. Works good and so far proven to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: I only need this for long range zoom and this is the main reason I bought it. Works good and so far proven to be useful for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: It Take Beautiful Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I just got this camera the other day it was really quick shipping which I loved ,!!! When I took some pics to see how it looks they looked amazing ,! Still getting use to it but it does have some draw backs It doesn't come with a manual which is hard for me to understand what some of the features are & how to use the Wifi because it won't let me select the wifi option ,?!?!??!??! BUT over all I like it
customer_reviews.author: Cookiie

customer_reviews.title: ... is slower than a DSLR but the zoom works nicely if you have the time to set up your ...
customer_reviews.text: camera is slower than a DSLR but the zoom works nicely if you have the time to set up your shot perfectly. I would suggest a tripd for long distance zoom as it almost always comes out blurry otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Red13

customer_reviews.title: The zoom on this camera is awesome! I bought it for taking shots of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The zoom on this camera is awesome! I bought it for taking shots of the moon and I'm totally satisfied with my photos. Also is great for shooting birds. I never leave home without this camera! True story.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: This Nikon camera was made for a country other than ...
customer_reviews.text: This Nikon camera was made for a country other than the United States. Nikon will not warranty this product. You can check with the Nikon website for the proper U.S. serial number that should be on the camera for it to be warrantied. I had to return the camera after I checked the serial number with Nikon. I did get a complete refund, however. Be wary of Nikon products listed below the Nikon advertised price.
customer_reviews.author: Marlee Anne

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little camera! Took some zoom shots in Hawaii that I never would have been able to do with my heavy digital SLR camera. As others have pointed out, it's slow, so it doesn't work great for action shots. All in all, I'm really pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: J.Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nikon will not help you with this product if anything happens to it.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item if you are in the United States. It is not a US product and Nikon will not help with warranty or repair if anything happens to it. I loved mine, don't get me wrong, but had a lens error turn it into a useless paperweight and Nikon refused to repair it because the serial number shows it is not a US product. Nikon basically allows their name to be on the product then disowns it. Now it's a $350 paperweight and I have no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: K S Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera with an astounding zoom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera with an astounding zoom. Clarity of pics of the moon are unbelievable. Posted some on a professional photographer site and got many great comments. I have found my camera....at least until i can get a p900 at a similar price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hanna

customer_reviews.title: A friend's desire.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a friend who seems to like very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This camera was bought as a replacement to my Nikon P510, which got damaged. Does not live up to the P510. Focus is a lot slower than the P510 at all focal lengths. The amount of time to process a picture is also a lot slower. May try a P530 or get a used P510.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Terenzio

customer_reviews.title: I've had Nikon cameras before and they've been fine. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've had Nikon cameras before and they've been fine. No complaints. This camera, however, is quite possibly the best I've ever used. If any brand. Took it out yesterday and just snapped away, randomly much of the time, in shade, in gloom, in full sun and everything in between. Each and every photo came out Sharp, clear, blur free and ready for framing. It's lightweight, it's smart looking and no one had to know I don't have a clue. Highly highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sue Peason

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start off by saying that I was very worried from selling my dslr to buy this camera.I wanted something that didn't require me to keep spending hundreds and hundreds of dollars on lenses to get the pictures I wanted.This camera was the right choice for me.I love that I can still get the shots that's are far away but still be able to get up close while using the micro setting.my only complaint is that it's very hard to stabilize it long enough to be able to get your picture completely in focus.Although once I get a tripod that problem will be solved.that's why I'm still giving it 5 stars.I would recommend this camera to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp photos, great zoom, lousy shutter speed
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures; easy to start using. However, the shutter speed is too slow for my tastes. My 2 year old point and shoot has faster shutter speed. You can get around the slow speed by putting the setting on either bird or animal.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Skyking

customer_reviews.title: The Best Camera I Have Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: The best camera I ever owned! The zoom is amazing. My moon pictures are legendary for the close ups of the craters. You will need a tripod for those long shots but it is an amazing camera. Could not be happier. Great video as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Heffner

customer_reviews.title: it's the worst camera I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to bring to Italy.... it's the worst camera I've ever used. It takes forever to focus. Does use RAW. The zoom lens is fantastic... sorry to say that's all I like about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best zoom ever
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely LOVES this camera. Best zoom ever...and way better quality than the last two Canons I bought her. The screen displays both went dead after a year or so on the Cannons, I'm not buying any more of those.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Grover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video clarity and a zoom that can video at ...
customer_reviews.text: I own 19 video cameras for our YouTube channel and this is one of our favorites. Amazing video clarity and a zoom that can video at great distances if the temp is cool enough you do not have mirage.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Camera. This small light weight camera takes fantastic pictures and has an unbelievable zoom. We have just returned from Mexico photographing whales. We were able to get whales 1/4 mile off shore in full frame.
customer_reviews.author: R. Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Great pics
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend buying. It takes very good pics. Havi it only a month and love it. Quick flash recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera. There are a few features I would like different places on the camera. This is good for someone that is new at photography
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Great digital "automatic" with TONs of features and control.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet Camera! Features galore, Great Auto Mode with full Control available plus.. The Videos are PERFECT!! The seller did a great job too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stansell

customer_reviews.title: make sure you buy extra good batteries and a home and auto charger
customer_reviews.text: make sure you buy extra good batteries and a home and auto charger-don't come with camera, using the long telephoto lense takes a lot of power. get the uv lens filters they work.protects your camera lens and gives great colors..camera is easy to use, love the color and has everything I wanted, highly recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Donna Traw

customer_reviews.title: Slow to focus on when the telecom is out to ...
customer_reviews.text: Slow to focus on when the telecom is out to the maximum. However can beat the price and quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz J

customer_reviews.title: A great camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. I was able to borrow the Panasonic Lumix 60x zoom camera and that is very good too, But for my purposes, mostly photographing birds, I like this one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no pro but my pictures look as though I am. This camera is amazing!!!!! If your new to photography and definitely suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Powell

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital camera, so I can't compare it to any other models, but it's amazing! I use it for wildlife photography (see attached images), but it takes really nice photos of the moon, as well! I've had it since July and I haven't had any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zoom for days
customer_reviews.text: This camera packs a serious punch. For the money, you cannot find a better deal. With the 60x optical zoom I clearly capture pictures that are 100 yards away. The camera is lightweight, has high quality textures, and the user interface is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Grundleger

customer_reviews.title: Focus was not great. Returned
customer_reviews.text: On/off button did not function correctly. Focus was not great. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: sydneykw

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. Takes great pictures and doesn't weight much
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. Takes great pictures and doesn't weight much. Perfect for traveling with.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This is such a good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. This is such a good camera
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Defective camera from factory
customer_reviews.text: defective camera , dial switch change automatically and does not allow to take pictures or videos!! Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: "calvarez28"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it soo much! Took a bunch of pictures!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: very good camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used the camera ma little bit since it came in. It met my expectations on the shots I took. I have spent some time reading and learning from the product manual which is very detailed. I will put it to a much bigger test when I go on vacation in a few weeks. so far, the camera is doing what I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: william wood

customer_reviews.title: Love the eas use & the quality of pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love the eas use & the quality of pictures. I have a SLR and I think the quality is just as good as that.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera more than I thought I would because ...
customer_reviews.text: Nikon Coolpix P 600. Bought this camera immediately after it was announced, at suggested retail price (price dropped $50 shortly after). I like this camera more than I thought I would because it takes really sharp pictures, even without a tripod. It has built in WiFi which allows transfer of pictures to an iPad without cables. Wi Fi Software Nikon provides is a little wonky, and it took me a while figure out - software needs major overhaul Nikon!! It has a built in flash, but no hot shoe probably because camera used for outside work mostly. Camera is certainly not compact, but it is much smaller than typical DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: NCG

customer_reviews.title: easy solution for me
customer_reviews.text: I spend hours every week hiking with my camera. This is a non-cumbersome, easy solution for me, and I'm happier than ever before with my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wendler

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in the Coolpic P600's ability to take action shots ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the Coolpic P600's ability to take action shots - my #1 complaint. The battery/memory card cover door seems flimsy - I anticipate having to use tape in the future to keep it closed. Other than that - takes GREAT still shots!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Battery charger kept running out after overnight of charging. Not satisfied....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, zoom is incredible
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, zoom is incredible. I can take detailed shots of the moon. It also has manual control, uncommon for a point-and-shoot. The main problem is that the manual control is not absolute. The range of aperture is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Pettus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing zoom, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing zoom, decent quality, light and portable. Perfect starter camera for my daughter who can't carry the heavy dslr zoom lens I carry around (nor wouldn't I purchase something so expensive for her). I personally am not a fan of the electronic viewfinder, but it doesn't seem to bother her. We were also disappointed at the location of the battery door - it makes it impossible to put a quick release plate on because it blocks the ability to open the door. With the electronic viewfinder she goes through a battery fast and in order to be able to carry a second one to pop in - we can't put on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Bruha

customer_reviews.title: all the extras are great nothing cheap
customer_reviews.text: Brand new in box,fast shipping,all the extras are great nothing cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value- same camera for $100 less than P610 and not back ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wetherille

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just got it. I think it's a five star camera.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: zoom and battery life great
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything about the camera. The zoom is great, and the battery life is also.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, travel friendly and easy to set and
customer_reviews.text: Great camera , travel friendly and easy to set and use
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: The best camera I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best camera I ever owned. easy to use and fantastic pics. I'm not the best at taking pics but I take a lot of them mostly wildlife and this camera is just amazing. would highly recommend. thanks Donna
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dugan

customer_reviews.title: A great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Nikon cameras!! The P600 is my favorite! Does everything I want!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Haas

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this camera for about two weeks and have taken 700+ pics. Great camera, awesome zoom! I don't think it would replace a DSLR, but is a very good bridge. Very happy :-)
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great pics, but too much hassle!
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon Coolpix P600 takes great pics! BUT it comes equipped with WiFi, which proved to be a major nuisance. The connection was difficult to establish, and once established would quickly fail! For some reason Nikon included this instead of GPS, but this was a detriment for me. In addition, the auto focus takes an inordinately long time to focus, sometimes more than 10 seconds. This made it pretty much useless for taking bird pictures. The pictures, when finally taken were great, but I think the Olympus SP 100 delivers more for a slightly lesser price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Fry

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the camera is fairly good. The zoom is excellent but the camera does ...
customer_reviews.text: If you do a lot of post processing then you should probably consider a camera with RAW output for photoshop, etc. Otherwise the camera is fairly good. The zoom is excellent but the camera does have problems in auto mode when first turned on. It alternates between several modes before settling down which can be irritating if you are trying to take a shot quickly. Update: This mode switching is very annoying and can cause you to lose shots. Don't buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was in great shape when arrived, price was right and it takes a great picture. Would buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera and all the accessories that came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a book manual on how to use the camera. My brother had the same camera so he was able to show me the basics but can find the user manual online. Love the camera and all the accessories that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bahle

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. Just what I was looking for. A small, compact, light weight adjustable focus length camera for traveling. Now I don't have carry a camera case with various lenses.
customer_reviews.author: cvic

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cam is good..lightweight easy to handle...good picture quality...waiting for a holiday to test it completely!
customer_reviews.author: Anu G.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Takes clear, quality photos! Great for action shots, like sports. The 60x zoom is also great. I also like the rechargeable batteries. Best camera I have ever purchased at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JBL, North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: great camera! Easy to use - fabulous shipping and ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera! Easy to use - fabulous shipping and customer service
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. Pictures are beautiful and vivid color. Easy to use. One of my best purcheses yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As It Should Be
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this camera is not as good as one would think. In a direct comparison with the Panasonic Lumix FZ70 camera, the Nikon was unable to focus on small items as well as the Lumix. Ironically, the Lumix was less expensive. I was surprised that the Nikon brand did not match the quality. The Nikon camera was more attractive though, but that is not the basis I buy cameras on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bish

customer_reviews.title: ... focosing the camera but other than that it takes great
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulty focosing the camera but other than that it takes great shots
customer_reviews.author: Geisha

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipment
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very nice and I can't wait to start using it! It came faster than it was expected and I am impressed! Thanks Jersey Cameras!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, But still getting use to the setting to be able to take perfect pictures
customer_reviews.author: nolan fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, and well-made. Great bird pictures! Looks sharp. Worth price. Plan to purchase an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Merkle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera, great pictures. It's all that an amateur photographer need.
customer_reviews.author: Popia Aurel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing zoom. I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing zoom. I love this camera. I am very glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nature pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how clear and sharp the pictures are. I take a lot of nature photos, both macro shots of insects and long distance shots of birds. these are much better focus and clarity than what my previous camera could do. I am very glad I made the move to this Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner or seasoned Photographer camera!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this type of camera after owning a "real" DLSR. But what a pleasant surprise when it actually allowed me to do more! As Forest Gump would have said, "Happy is as Happy does!" Great little camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pariseau

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a real nice camera. I did not receive my warranty card ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a real nice camera. I did not receive my warranty card however. I really like it so far. So many options.
customer_reviews.author: frank miles

customer_reviews.title: Great camera received ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera & I love it! So I had to get my husband one. They shipped it to be faster then I would have imagined. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Eva A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect family camera with high quality video and pictures for creating lifelong memories.
customer_reviews.author: East bay mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great camera for general photos lots of good features
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Roper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price, clear image and great zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Millan

customer_reviews.title: SQUEEZED BADLY & SOUR
customer_reviews.text: Less tha a month . Most of that time on a closet shelf . Used it yesterday & turned it off all was fine. Picked it up to take a photo today & it's not working. I will be contacting the agent distributer come Monday. At least if I'd bought the one with the full accessory kit off another site I'd only be out $229. v.s. $245. Nothing makes a bad deal more bitter than to get a lemon on top .
customer_reviews.author: W.T. HAMPTON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera and I am so glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Swiger

customer_reviews.title: Watch the birdie!
customer_reviews.text: I love my "red cam"! I use this camera a lot for birding and it is able to get close up with very good quality. It is satisfying to get feather detail on a bird waaaaaay over there. I had an older Coolpix, l loved it too, but this one is perfect for hiking...not too bulky, but very versatile. Once in a while it "freezes" with the lens extended and I have to pop the battery out to restart it, otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bale

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I had a Fugifilm S8200 I traded it and bought the Nikon because or the rechagable batterys and the 60x zoom and better built camera all together....if you have the money buy one you will also love it..........
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Camera just does not perform well. Considering the optics and the camera name, I was disappointed in the poor quality electronic viewfinder as it takes forever to zoom, focus, and record images even with high speed class 10 memory cards. Images are inconsistent and the fact that the battery has to be charged in the camera is another negative. If you are considering a super zoom, look to the Sony hx400 as it has same zoom but viewfinder is user friendly, and images are better.
customer_reviews.author: lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. I just had my 1st grand baby and I use it all the time for pictures. I also have a boat club on a chain of lakes and it is really great for getting up close to nature. I would definitely recommend this camera. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Roxygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera lives up to positive comments. I had it out of box and up and shooting incredibly high def photos after charging and installing memory card (needs to be purchased separately). Camera is easy to handle, feels great, and the long shots are amazing! Having a blast with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Paoa94

customer_reviews.title: The zoom is incredible and I loved the shooting scenes
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is incredible and I loved the shooting scenes, but the depth of field doesn't render as soft a background as I would like on Macro. Also the camera was defective, and I when I sent it in to Nikon for repair, they told me it was refurbished, not NEW as it was stated to be. I will not purchase from DAILYBARGAINS ever again. Fortuantely, I purchased the warranty and recieved a refund from the warranty company. I gave up the super zoom and decided to go with a DSLR instead.
customer_reviews.author: mebevans

customer_reviews.title: another great Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight, easily portable, controls are intuitive Cons: very difficult to get wi-fi to work
customer_reviews.author: Maxie

customer_reviews.title: Should have stayed with Canon!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible camera. Zoom freezes. Have to turn it off and back on to get it to move. Shutter takes several seconds to shoot, making you miss the next photo opportunity. Purchased it to replace an old Canon S1IS. SO, SO SORRY that I didn't stick with the Canon brand!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J Doty

customer_reviews.title: The camera so far seems fine. The big gripe was there was no
customer_reviews.text: The camera so far seems fine .The big gripe was there was no! instructions at all!I called Nikon they said they went green and you have to down load the instruction's, after two weeks of trying to down load and failing I had to order a book from amazon for twenty five dollars.Everything else you buy you get instructions so Nikon wake up!
customer_reviews.author: tom jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It's a good go between digital camera. Love the zoom, and the operation is flawless. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Stove

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! it takes beautiful pictures and amazing video even in low light. The zoom was especially important to me for wildlife shots and you can count their eye lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Senger

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX P600 16.1 MP Wi-Fi CMOS Digital Camera with 60x Zoom NIKKOR Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Red) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Style:BaseFROM THE MANUFACTURER


AN ADVANCED PERFORMANCE CAMERA THAT HAS IT ALL—AMAZING ZOOM POWER, OUTSTANDING IMAGE QUALITY AND THE CONVENIENCE OF WI-FI CONNECTIVITY.
 What can you see with the power of a 60x optical zoom NIKKOR Super ED glass lens? The nuance of your child's expression the moment she scores a goal; the small beads of sweat on a performer's brow during an evening concert; the flittering movements of a bird so far in the distance, it doesn't even notice you. Combine that game-changing zoom power with a CMOS image sensor capable of preserving the fine details of those views, blazing fast autofocus and shooting speeds, a swiveling LCD, manual controls and a battery that lasts up to approx. 330 shots per charge, and you've got one of the most powerful, exciting COOLPIX cameras yet, the COOLPIX P600. What's more? Moments after you capture an extreme close-up, it can appear on your compatible smartphone or tablet for easy sharing. For those seeking zoom power and advanced performance, the COOLPIX P600 delivers. 



GET EVEN CLOSER TO WHAT MATTERS
ZOOM IN CLOSE WITH DYNAMIC FINE ZOOM
Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have helped make Nikon famous. The COOLPIX P600’s 60x optical zoom lens goes from wide-angle—great for portraits and landscapes—all the way up to telephoto—great for close-ups of sports, concerts, nature and more. When you need even more reach, zoom up to 60x with optical zoom and 120x with Dynamic Fine Zoom, an enhanced digital zoom function that effectively doubles your reach. 

YOUR SMARTPHONE'S NEW BEST FRIEND
BUILT-IN WI-FI FOR INSTANT PHOTO SHARING AND REMOTE CAMERA CONTROL WITH A COMPATIBLE SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
Your smartphone or tablet will be your favorite accessory! Take beautiful photos with the COOLPIX P600 and watch them instantly appear on your compatible smartphone or tablet. Then share them without missing a beat—text them, email them, upload to your favorite social networking site—it’s your choice! You can even use your smartphone or tablet as a remote control for the COOLPIX P600, perfect for self-portraits and group shots that actually include you. 

PRECISE HIGH RESOLUTION MONITOR
DUAL VIEWING SYSTEMS—VARI-ANGLE DISPLAY AND ELECTRONIC EYE-LEVEL VIEWFINDER
Shooting conditions vary, so the COOLPIX P600 has two viewing systems: a large 3-inch Vari-angle display that swings and swivels to provide easy viewing from almost any position, plus an electronic Eye-Level viewfinder for D-SLR-style shooting. Find exciting new perspectives by swiveling out the Vari-angle display and moving the camera around—raise it overhead or move it to ground-level for suprising new views. When conditions require, use the bright, Electronic Eye-Level viewfinder and frame exactly the shot you want.

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR VISION
FULL MANUAL EXPOSURE CONTROL LETS YOU BRING YOUR CREATIVE VISION TO LIFE
The COOLPIX P600 takes exceptional images on its own, but when you want to take control of exposure, you can. Select from Program, Shutter Priority, Aperture Priority or Manual mode and create without limitations. 





SHOOT MORE, CHARGE LESS
TAKE UP TO 330 PHOTOS ON A SINGLE BATTERY CHARGE
The COOLPIX P600 is designed to maximize the time you spend taking great photos and videos. Thanks to an improved energy efficient design, you can shoot up to approx. 330 photos at full resolution on a single battery charge! Spend more time capturing special moments and less time waiting for a charge.







SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 * AN-CP21 Strap
 * UC-E21 USB Cable
 * EN-EL23 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * Charging AC Adapter EH-71P
 * LC-CP29 Lens Cap
feature_bullets: Zoom up to 60x with optical zoom and 120x with Dynamic Fine Zoom
Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing
Vari-angle display and Electronic Eye-Level viewfinder
Full manual exposure control lets you bring your creative vision to life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars294 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
